tool.name: CNVkit Heatmap
tool.description: Draw copy number (either bins (.cnn, .cnr) or segments (.cns)) for multiple samples as a heatmap.
tool.command: ln -s '$input_cns_file' ./tumor.cns && cnvkit.py heatmap ./tumor.cns --output '$output_setting.output' #if $advanced_settings.by_bin --by-bin #end if #if $advanced_settings.chromosome --chromosome '$advanced_settings.chromosome' #end if #if $advanced_settings.desaturate --desaturate #end if #if $advanced_settings.male_reference --male-reference #end if --sample-sex '$advanced_settings.sample_sex' #if $advanced_settings.no_shift_xy --no-shift-xy #end if #if $advanced_settings.vertical --vertical #end if #if $advanced_settings.delimit_samples --delimit-samples #end if #if $advanced_settings.title --title '$advanced_settings.title' #end if
tool.help: Get an overview of the larger-scale CNVs in a cohort
